author: Staff Reporter
text:
A newborn barn owl, rescued by some bird lovers from near here, was released into the wild near Amaravathi Dam.

District Forest Officer A. Periasamy said that the bird was found lying on the roadside near Avinashi after it fell during the flight. While the owl was being attacked by crows, two bird lovers rescued the bird and handed over to us, he said.
title: Barn owl released into wild
